room_title: Escape room "Behind The Curtain" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
room_description: Your team has been tasked with a sensitive recovery operation by the global scientific research initiative known as ONEIROS. An escaped test subject has been on the run and your agent-in-charge has narrowed the search to the abandoned Reverie theater. Your team must gain access to the location, secure any vital intel, then rendezvous with your lead agent before the strict timetable is expired.
